programmes.show_description: Action comedy starring Rutger Hauer. A blind Vietnam veteran trains in martial arts before returning to America, where he uses his skills to protect the son of a fellow soldier from mobsters.
Devilish frights. College student Samantha takes a babysitting job that happens to coincide with a lunar eclipse unaware that her clients are planning for her to be part of a satanic ritual.

A man claims his ex-tenant damaged his rental unit, stole property and allegedly forged documents to try and prove otherwise.
A young lawyer sues his former tenants for unpaid rent and damages to his home after complaints of strong pet odours by neighbours.
After a dispute over rent, a woman posts a video referencing a personal story that her ex-roommate had shared with her.
A salon owner for 19 years decides to start anew with fellow hair dressers; their partnership ends in a fight over allegedly stolen property and lost wages.
A sneak peek at a phone allegedly leads to an assault, false arrest and a scar on a man's face.
A woman's wild effort to pick-up her car lands her in jail for alleged assault and theft; she sues for a false arrest.
A woman is convicted of assault after cutting her daughter with a knife during an altercation over puppies; video evidence captures the bloody aftermath.
The Judge warns a grandmother about the risk of having a dangerous dog breed after her Pit Bull attacks a neighbour.
The Judge calls a man out on his inconsistent testimony when he confesses that he sold the camper trailer he's being sued for.

Stranger Danger: This series invites audiences into the intriguing realm of crime-solving with Steve Keogh, a detective with 30 years of experience, 12 of those as a top-tier murder detective.
Detectives discuss the brutal murder of Mohammed Yousaf by two greedy plotters. Experts reveal the forensic and psychological clues.
Las Vegas investigative reporter Jeff German was a local legend, but in September 2022, it was the reporter making headlines.
When a grandmother is found murdered in her hotel room, the killer wounds himself and inadvertently turns himself in.
Sibling Rivalry: Analysing the evidence, the medical detectives solve real crimes using forensic techniques, alongside reconstructions (which may be unsuitable for younger viewers).

Chuck Norris fights crime and helps the community as the eponymous Walker. The chief of the Cherokee Nation is suspected of murder...
Crime drama with Shia LaBeouf. Three brothers running a Depression-era bootlegging operation come under threat from a corrupt deputy sheriff, forcing them to fight to defend their livelihood.
Crime drama with Craig Fairbrass. When a British military contractor learns that his daughter has died, he arrives in Los Angeles to discover a stranger's body and sets out to find her.
Action thriller with Nicolas Cage. A police officer takes matters into his own hands and assembles a group of strangers to help a single mother get vengeance on the men who raped her.
Crime drama based on true events. A ragtag group of ageing East End criminals plot an audacious, multi-million-pound raid on an underground facility in London.

A restaurant server claims she was 'football tackled' by her roommate because she was ignoring her during an argument.
When a woman allegedly spins her car and sprays rocks at her estranged lover, he is accused of firing back with a handful of rocks.
An experiment in living together fails miserably when a pregnant young woman sues her ex-boyfriend for $4,000 in moving costs.
A man is short on money to pay rent and a security deposit, so he offers up the use of his car; his roommate says that never happened.
Shards of glass from a broken window lead a haemophiliac to fear for his life and file a restraining order against a fellow tenant.
A flatbed driver accuses his boss of stealing over $2,000 from his paycheck to cover repairs after he has an accident.
A woman cites friends and neighbours as witnesses to her ex-coworker's alleged violence, but none of them show up in court.
A mother of three fails to report income and loses her Section 8 status prompting her landlord to kick her out; her 'guarantor' father refuses to pay up as promised.
A woman demands that her estranged stepdad pay for a loan to catch up on mortgage payments; he claims the loan was between her and her mother.

New Leaf: This series invites audiences into the intriguing realm of crime-solving with Steve Keogh, a detective with 30 years of experience, 12 of those as a top-tier murder detective.
Steve Keogh discusses the murder of Jodie Chesney, a 17-year old girl stabbed in a park. The police, a CCTV expert, and court reporter share how the case was solved.
This episode looks at the intriguing case of Kouri Richins, a children's book author who finds herself at the centre of a murder investigation following the death of her husband.
When a state trooper is attacked, investigators uncover a 'signature' that links the assault to the murder of a young woman.

Chuck Norris is Walker in this modern, high-kicking martial arts western. Alex is among those held hostage when a group of escaped prisoners take shelter in a church.
Mountain adventure starring Chris O'Donnell. A climber must rescue his sister from certain death when she becomes stranded just a few hundred feet from the summit of K2.
Thriller with Antonio Banderas. An ageing mob hitman turns against his boss and sacrifices everything to rescue a young runaway from the very organisation he has dedicated his life to building.
